block.extendedseating.chair.tooltip.summ: Sit yourself down and enjoy the ride just a little more! Will anchor a player onto a moving _contraption_. An appealing option for static furniture too! Comes in a variety of colours.
block.extendedseating.chair.tooltip.beha: Sits the player on the _Chair_. Press L-shift to leave the _Chair_.
block.extendedseating.seatwood_planks.to: Not a very useful block on its own, but useful together with _Copycat_ blocks.
